leftContent.title: AINIMAL
leftContent.subtitle: Software Engineer
items: Spearheaded the migration from Vue.js and Cordova to React Native, significantly improving user experience and optimizing performance for a large-scale online dating app with 10K+ active users on Android and iOS
Improved code quality and maintainability by implementing ESLint and Prettier, and refactoring JavaScript code to TypeScript for enhanced type safety and scalability.
Developed and maintained backend APIs, including WebSocket environments, ensuring seamless real-time communication and improving overall app performance

items: Developed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
